subject: Amputation
Track and Field
lead_paragraph: The double amputee Oscar Pistorius of South Africa will compete against the three-time Olympic gold medalist Jeremy Wariner in the 400 meters at the Adidas Grand Prix.
snippet: The double amputee Oscar Pistorius of South Africa will compete against the three-time Olympic gold medalist Jeremy Wariner in the 400 meters at the Adidas Grand Prix.
